comments.author: edwinraj.p@gmail.com
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1) AppleWebKit/534.24 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/11.0.696.71 Safari/534.24

Steps to reproduce:

Double click and install the Firefox setup file, Install by slandered/custom installation,


Actual results:

While installing the firefox setup file "firefox must be closed to proceed with the installation" warning message is thrown


Expected results:

Firefox should be install, find the attached .swf video file
comments.creator: edwinraj.p@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1) AppleWebKit/534.24 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/11.0.696.71 Safari/534.24

Steps to reproduce:

Double click and install the Firefox setup file, Install by slandered/custom installation,


Actual results:

While installing the firefox setup file "firefox must be closed to proceed with the installation" warning message is thrown


Expected results:

Firefox should be install, find the attached .swf video file

comments.creator: bugzilla@mversen.de
comments.raw_text:
Which Firefox version ?
Is this the first install on a new system or do you already have Firefox installed ?
comments.text:
Which Firefox version ?
Is this the first install on a new system or do you already have Firefox installed ?
comments.author: bugzilla@mversen.de

comments.raw_text:
Did you have another version of Firefox installed before that?
Or did just wanted to install another version and keep the old one?
As a response to comment 1 it seems that your firefox.exe process did not exit when you closed Firefox.
So when you tried to install firefox you couldn't, because Firefox was already running!
Please get back with a comment,so we can figure out what the issue was!
Thanks!
comments.author: trifandreialin@gmail.com
